snippet: The first sign a major knuckleball is coming in the baseball play "Bronx Bombers" is when the smoke machines crank up....

headline.print_headline: Review: 'Bronx Bombers' Adoringly Looks at Yanks

lead_paragraph: The first sign a major knuckleball is coming in the baseball play "Bronx Bombers" is when the smoke machines crank up.
